articles.description: There's a raunchy new movie on Netlflix that has fans of the Fifty Shades of Grey series getting hot under the collar - but others have a major issue with the plot
articles.content:
Fifty Shades of Grey fans have found themselves a raunchy new obsession.
An English version of the Polish movie 365 DNI (also known as 365 Days) has just landed on Netflix in the UK.
The film is an… [+2398 chars]

articles.title: 'I May Destroy You' is a defining moment for on-screen portrayals of consent and sexual violence - Mashable

articles.content:
